sentences: Tema õnnitlustest oli näha, et ta tõesti vääris nende austust.
Kõik said temale head õnnitlused enne kontserti.
context: Õnnitlused is the plural form of the Estonian word 'õnnitus', which means congratulations or good wishes. It's typically used when expressing celebratory greetings, especially for birthdays, anniversaries, or other special occasions. The word appears in contexts where people are offering their best wishes and positive sentiments to someone celebrating something important.
